about.text1: SereneBreath.com is a small webapp to help you improve your breathing, relaxing and managing your stress.
about.text2: This project is open source and open for new contributions. Check out its repo for more info:
about.text3: English and bell audio files are from the great Breathly app, which also inspired this app.

awake.title: Awake
awake.description: Use this technique first thing in the morning for quick burst of energy and alertness.

square.title: Square
square.description: Box breathing, also referred to as square breathing, can help you slow down your breathing and reduce stress.

deepCalm.title: Deep Calm
deepCalm.description: A natural tranquilizer for the nervous system. Do it at least twice a day.

pranayama.title: Pranayama
pranayama.description: A main component of yoga, an exercise for physical and mental wellness.

ujjayi.title: Ujjayi
ujjayi.description: Balance influence on the cardiorespiratory system, release fellings of irritation, and calm the mind and body.
